title: [LISTEN] U.R.I - Black Flag
content:
After we premièred his début track "Diamonds", he's been experimenting with analogue synths, fluent drum beats and edgy guitar sounds, and he's even managed to create an interesting dimension within the indie-rock genre, showcasing a processed electronic production whilst still keeping the warmth that always stood out in his songs. His new track "Black Flag" is far from his debut, it's a rather gentle acoustic number, you need to check this one out!!!
U.R.I - Live dates
Oct 1st – The Old Queens Head, Islington.
Oct 27th – The Underbelly, Hoxton.
Listen / [SOUNDCLOUD]
